entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 11.9Â°C

Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
